long_description: The Crud Roadracer MK2 road fenders extend your riding season whether or not your road bike has clearance for traditional fenders. Fenders provide protection from road water and debris at a stunningly light 180g-for the pair! New, long tails front and back keep even more water and grit off you than before. Unique design uses filament brushes that "float" fender off rims and center them over tires. Attach to a bike in minutes using easily adjusted rubber fittings. Designed to fit 700c road and race bikes with minimal fender clearance; maximum tire size is 25mm. .
short_description: The Crud Roadracer MK2 road fenders extend your riding season whether or not your road bike has clearance for traditional fenders.
